## RevealableContract type

> This feature is currently in beta and may change based on feedback that we receive.

The possible revealable contract types.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare type RevealableContract =
  | NFTDrop
  | SignatureDrop
  | SmartContract
  | null;
```
